name: music.search
description:
# 搜索歌曲，来首歌，我想听歌
def music.search(song: string, musician: string, list: string, album: string, ranking: string, instrument: string, style: string, language: string, times: string, emotion: string, scene: string, gender: string, free: boolean):
# song: 歌曲名
# musician: 歌手
# list: 歌单
# album: 专辑
# ranking: 排行榜
# instrument: 乐器
# style: 风格
# language: 语言
# times: 年代
# emotion: 心情
# scene: 场景
# gender: 性别
# free: 是否免费

qa.Q: 我想听周杰伦的《七里香》
qa.A: music.search(song = 七里香, musician = 周杰伦)

qa.Q: 播放王菲的《红豆》
qa.A: music.search(song = 红豆, musician = 王菲)

qa.Q: 我想听周杰伦的《七里香》
qa.A: music.search(song = 七里香, musician = 周杰伦)

qa.Q: 播放王菲的《红豆》
qa.A: music.search(song = 红豆, musician = 王菲)

qa.Q: 找一下《告白气球》的免费版本
qa.A: music.search(song = 告白气球, free = True)
